data.text: @MattD999 @ajplus ... indeed - just like something you'd see under other despot regimes like Arden or Trudeau too.
@WarriorFijian @ajplus Well no surprise there. Russia is not a democracy and Putin is a dictator. The protesters are not being anti-democratic... they are being anti-authoritirian.

@MattD999 @ajplus Yes - like these unrulily anti-democrats! How dare they peacefully question the democratically elected like Putin or Arden?! Quite right both have sent their goons after the demonstrators. 

https://t.co/DXrvipZ9iI

@WarriorFijian @ajplus But in every democratic and civilization people who riot and burn buildings are being anti-democratic and harm society. We have agreed as a nation that this kind of violence is arrestable because it's anti-peaceful and undemocratic.

@WarriorFijian @ajplus I don't know enough details to know what's going on in Russia because of the media and propaganda. But what I can tell you is I am not a defender of authoritarianism and neither is anyone else who has commented on this thread.
@MattD999 @ajplus Yes - and I'm sure in your mind the police in Moscow are doing just the same. You defenders of authoritarians like Putin or Arden need to wake up.
@WarriorFijian @ajplus Pretty sure the cops are just arresting people in New Zealand for burning shit. Not the same thing as whatever you're talking about.

@MattD999 @ajplus ... I believe they're referred to as "undesirables", or "right wing nazis" by Putin, Arden and Trudeau.... back in 1930s Europe those the regimes didn't like were called 'Jews' or 'Jewish sympathisers'.

It's funny how the elites don't like anyone who asks why.
@WarriorFijian @ajplus You mean the people burning and vandalizing stuff?
